channel.title: Smart Data Foundry | Data Science Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Smart Data Foundry | Data Science Blog

item.title: About
item.author: smartdatafoundry@ed.ac.uk (Opening Finance for Good)
item.description: Hi! This is the blog for the Data Science Team at the Smart Data Foundry. We use this blog to share technical outputs and lessons we’ve learned, we hope you find it useful. The team is comprised of: Nick Radcliffe David Tracy Pei Shan Yu Paola Arce Mike Spencer Victor Diaz Jack MacKenzie Eric Janto Fiona Rasanga We come from a wide range of backgrounds, but are united by our enthusiasm for data and the tools that help improve its use.
